body:
I know it's a bit late to make suggestions because we're just going into a new update but, why not right? Devs are always open to suggestions so, I was thinking about having a chat box in the forums.
For example, you want to message a friend, well,  you just go in his profile, press the "Open chat box" option a side from his name and a box will pop up, then all you will have to do is start chatting. 
Communication (Community - Staff) would be so much easier and complaints would be reduced so if you add this into the website, I would be pleased.
Thanks for reading!
Juan c:
